text: Nigba ti (ayaba) gbo ete (oro) won (ti won n so nipa re), o ranse si won. O si pese ohun jije ajokooje sile fun won. O fun ikookan won ni obe (ti o maa fi jeun). O si so pe: “Jade si won, (Yusuf).” Nigba ti won ri i, won gbe e tobi (fun ewa ara re). Won si rera won lowo (fun iyanu ewa ara re). Won si wi pe: “Mimo ni fun Allahu! Eyi ki i se abara. Ki ni eyi bi ko se molaika alapon-onle.”
